body: * Drop all discoverables that are not used by Home Assistant's old discovery integration. To see what was supported, check [2.9.0](https://github.com/home-assistant-libs/netdisco/tree/2.9.0/netdisco/discoverables)
* Add the ability to suppress mdns service scans for some services #256

## What's Changed

* Fix entries dump with latest zeroconf (#255) @bdraco

## What's Changed

* Prevent ServiceBrowser from collapsing when encountering a BadTypeInNameException (#254) @bdraco

## What's Changed

* Fix mdns discovery (#253) @bdraco

## What's Changed

* Use shared zeroconf instance and single service browser (#252) @bdraco

## What's Changed

* Fix warning for missing callback in zeroconf (eab3d56ef310fc1237fc4ed564b6aee327c6bc98)

## What's Changed

* Support for zeroconf >0.27 @balloob

## What's Changed

* Add discovery of HEOS devices (#250) @andrewsayre
* Discover openhome devices with Product:1 service (#118) (#247) @andreasreinhardt

## What's Changed

* Add hass mobile app detection (#246) @balloob

## What's Changed

* add support for digitalstrom ip servers (dss-ip) (#239) @lociii
* be more strict on songpal filtering (#240) @rytilahti
* Add support for discovering enigma2 based devices (#241) @fbradyirl
* add hikvision discovery (#243) @fbradyirl
* Add support for Sercomm IP camera discovery. (#238) @brandond
* Bump version from 2.3.0 to 2.4.0 (#245) @fbradyirl

## What's Changed

* Don't bother shipping a universal wheel (#224) @scop
* Start adding type hints, test with mypy (#228) @scop
* Add esphomelib discovery (#229) @OttoWinter
* Add long description and classifiers (#231) @fabaff
* Discover openhome devices with Product:3 service (#232) @bazwilliams

## What's Changed

* Fix reuse of UPNP UDP port in NAS may fail. (#217) @ultratoto14
* Add Xbox One SmartGlass discovery (#218) @tuxuser
* Catch potential decode error when decoding for ascii (#220) @nielstron
* Make LG soundbars discoverable (#219) @mjg59
* Remove warning when SSDP can't parse description (#221) @balloob

## What's Changed

* Ensure N301 player ignored by yamaha discovery as not supported (#207) @vrih
* Misc cleanups (#208) @scop
* Add UPnP/IGD discoverable (#210) @StevenLooman
* Fix igd module docstring (#212) @scop
* Remove netifaces lib reference (#215) @awarecan
* Remove broken GDMDiscoverable.info_from_entry (#209) @scop
* Include tests in PyPI tarball (#205) @dotlambda

## What's Changed

* Include device name in Homekit info (#199) @mjg59
* Add Python 3.7 to test matrix (#200) @scop
* Pylint cleanups (#201) @scop
* Add python_requires >= 3 to setup.py (#202) @scop
* Remove Python 2 remnants (#203) @scop
* Separate DLNA_DMR and DLNA_DMS devices (#204) @StevenLooman

## Breaking change

Since #204, we no longer discover 'dlna' but instead discover 'dlna_dmr' and 'dlna_dms' separately.

- Discover Arduino-like devices (#198 - @fabaff)
- Add DLNA/DMR discovery (#196 - @StevenLooman)
- Added Cambridge Audio discoverable. (#191 - @sebk-666)

- Better Yeelight device identification - #182
- Canon printer - #183
- AVM Fritz - #186 
- HP Printers - #185
- Ignore Sony Bravia TVs from Songpal detection (#180 - @rytilahti)

- Allow newer zeroconf versions (#178 - @dotlambda)
- Added a Samsung Printer discoverable (#174 - @nielstron)
- Add discovery of Huawei routers (#175 - @scop)
- Add UDN to SSDP discoverables, as discussed in #165 (#173 - @rytilahti)
- Add discovery of Freebox servers (#172 - @stilllman)
- Add support for discovery of TiVo devices providing remote control. (#170 - @patthoyts)
- Add Yeelight Ceiling Light support (#168 - @pauln)
- Fixed regular expression for parsing HTTP headers in order to allow 0 or more white spaces between the first colon(:) and field-content. (#167 - @tango-foxtrot)
- Add support for ASUS routers (#164 - @scop)
- harmony: Fix module docstring (#163 - @scop)
- Add manufacturer to SSDP discoverable data (#165 - @scop)

- Add Yeelight Bedside Lamp support (#160) (@pauln)
- Add Nanoleaf Aurora support (#161) (@stuwil)
- Daikin: Don't return UTF8 encoded info to HA since it can't handle it yet (#158) (@rofrantz)
- Allow detecting deCONZ separately from Philips Hue bridges (#156) (@kroimon)
- Add Ziggo Mediabox XL support (#155) (@b10m)
- Add support for Konnected Security devices. (#154) (@emosenkis)
- Ignore non-utf8 ssdp responses in scan() (@mgsb - #140)
- GDM: Use the extended signature of setsockopt (#148 - @trbs)

- add yeelight strip support (#135 - @abmantis)
- Fix zeroconf to install 0.19.1 correctly (@balloob)
- Add Lutron discoverable (#139 - @upsert)
- MDNSDiscoverable: Set ATTR_MAC_ADDRESS if available. (#143 - @pfalcon)
- Add Xiaomi Mi Home Gateway discovery. (#144 - @pfalcon)

- Support for OctoPrint (#133) (@w1ll1am23)
- Added support for Wink (#132) (@w1ll1am23)
- Depend on zeroconf 0.19.1

- Include license in source (@bachp)
- SSDP: Handle responses without a location (@balloob)

- Rewrite discovery to always return a dictionary of found values

Some more things, todo…
- Fix bug where mdns devices would not be discovered.
- Add timeouts to Hue and SSDP requests to make sure that we don't block indefinitely. (@balloob)

**This version drops Python 2 support.**
- Fix Hue memory leak (@tomusher)
- Hue: properly handle exceptions (@molobrakos)
- Extract only max-age from cache-control header (@bazwilliams)
- Fix another Hue memory leak (@balloob)
- Clean up after we stop scanning (@balloob)
- Drop Python 2 support (@balloob)
- Remove unnecessary locks (@balloob)
- Do not use extra threads for scanning (@balloob)

- Revert fluxled (@balloob)
- Add NUPNP Hue discovery (@grunskis)

- Discover LMS web server port (#80, @dasos)
- Yeelight support (#81, @jjensn)
- Standardize entry dict (#82, @balloob)
- Add OpenHome (#86, @bazwilliams)
- Yeelight: decode properties to utf-8 (#85, @rytilahti)
- Reuse Address for Samsung AC Discovery (#66, @chuegle)
- Added discovers for Frontier Silicon devices (#88, @zhelev)
- Check that ST exists for UPnP device in frontier silicon (#89, @postlund)
- Add Apple TV support (#90, @postlund)
- Add Fluxled discovery (#91, @aequitas)
- Add Denon AVR Receiver discovery (@scarface-4711)

- Significantly speed up discovery by parallelizing scans (@magicus - #70, #71)
- Add discovery for Samsung Smart TV (@magicus - #68)
- Fix Kodi and SABnzbd discovery (@magicus - #69)

- Discover Samsung Smart Air Conditioners (@sfam)
- Improve LG SmartTV discovery (@rofrantz)
- Discover Bose SoundTouch (@trunet)

- Return host on ip convertion error (@glance-)
- Yamaha Discovery fixes (@sdague)
- Discover Yamaha Receivers (@sdague)

- Discover Home Assistant instances (@fabaff)
- Discover DirecTV (@cbulock)
- Plex discovery: Fix crashing when servers had non ascii names (@fabaff) (#32)
- Discover MyStrom devices (@fabaff)
- Added support to discover Roku devices

- LG webOS TV (@TheRealLink)
- SabNZBD (@hellowlol)
- Fix Python 2.7 issue (@hellowlol)
- Flake8 + PyLint (@balloob)
- Fix OS X SSDP discovery issue #25 (@balloob)
- Support discovering Panasonic Viera TVs (@florianholzapfel)

- Discover Tellstick Net devices (@molobrakos)
- Bind sockets to interface addresses when sending ssdp requests. (@jaharkes)
